summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Puget Sound Traction, Light & Power Company, its successors and assigns, to temporarily cease the operation of its street cars upon certain portions of 23rd Avenue West, Commodore Way, across 26th Avenue West; the alley in block 79 of Gilman's Addition to City of Seattle, and upon Government Way; and authorizing said company to temporarily lay tracks and operate its cars over that portion of Gilman Avenue established by Ordinance No. 29974, between the intersection of Gilman Avenue and 23rd Avenue West and Government Way.
